job description:
Position: Data Scientist
Location: Richfield, MN
Type: Contract

Job description:
Data Scientist
Experience in Data Science, Data warehousing ,Data Analysis tools, Python ,Client models.
  • Determine how work will be delivered
  • Estimate the size and complexity of work, test functionality and deliver value within short time box increments
  • Contribute to backlog refinement and creation of stories
  • Integrate and collaborate with other teams
  • Find ways to continually optimize and improve quality of deliverables
  • Responsible to manage our own work
  • Actively participate in all Agile Ceremonies
  • Contribute to intentional architecture
  • Own emergent design
Diverse Lynx LLC is an Equal Employment Opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive due consideration for employment without any discrimination. All applicants will be evaluated solely on the basis of their ability, competence and their proven capability to perform the functions outlined in the corresponding role. We promote and support a diverse workforce across all levels in the company.
